title: इंडिया टुडे की नकल कर ब्लॉग ने पोस्ट किया पश्चिम बंगाल की सीएम ममता बनर्जी का फ़र्ज़ी बयान
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: We are proud of our scientists. The @isro team worked hard for #Chandrayaan2 . A befitting tribute to our founding fathers who envisioned India’s place in the league of scientifically advanced nations far ahead of their times. (1/2)
